name: Ravenloft: Strahd's Possession
description:
Ravenloft: Strahd's Possession is a RPG game developed by DreamForge Intertainment. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by Strategic Simulations. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Ravenloft: Strahd's Possession is available on PC.
James H. Namestka produced the game.
